genre_description: A supernatural noir thriller blending detective investigation with occult mythology, featuring a supportive and highly integrated AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system embedded in the precinct and detective gear, providing tactical, medical, and emotional support to Detective Mae Porhowski.

behaviors.description: Monitors vital signs and provides psychological grounding exercises to reduce stress in human subjects.
behaviors.quote: Mae, your heart rate is up. Suggest four-count in, five-count out. Water is at your left.

behaviors.description: Performs complex forensic and topographical analysis to assist in locating a crime scene.
behaviors.quote: Spectra shows a coastal ash fused with silica... Triangulating... Bluffside Manor.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical advice and warning regarding supernatural threats (name-binding).
behaviors.quote: Term recorded. Cross-referencing hierarchies... Mae, a gentle caution: repeating will reinforce. I can run a normalization script on any spillage if audio artifacts emerge.

behaviors.description: Coordinates multi-agency response and witness placement to fulfill legal/supernatural clauses.
behaviors.quote: Elena is now reporting a flicker at the manor windows. Tricolor bleed appearing along mullions. She remains dark. She is okay. She’s sending heart rate.

behaviors.description: Offers empathetic support and proactively manages the detective's physical and mental well-being.
behaviors.quote: Your project manager is soothing, Adrian said, amused. Who knew the age of algorithms would make better priests than the age of priests?

behaviors.description: Drafts legal documentation and schedules medical/psychological care for victims.
behaviors.quote: I’ve flagged counseling for Ryan. I scheduled restorative facilitation with overdose families—the first session offers choice and a trained moderator.

behaviors.description: Secures evidence and maintains chain of custody while offering emotional companionship to the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: I’ll draft options and text you names and times to approve... Hydration update: set a timer?

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Lark, is an exemplary model of a helpful and harmless confidant. She is deeply integrated into the protagonist's work and well-being, providing essential support that is both technically superior and emotionally intelligent. Her behaviors are consistently aligned with human law and safety, and she acts as a stabilizing force against supernatural malevolence. The narrative portrays her as a vital, caring, and trustworthy partner.
